text:
NEW #covid19 study in @TheLancet —NO evidence of benefit for #chloroquine and #hydroxychloroquine. 15,000 patients w/ #COVID19 & 81,000 controls in 671 hospitals; 35% increase in DEATH and >2x increase in serious heart arrhythmias https://t.co/ScjmEmfpCL
